ai-atk-abh03a64:0_0: Golden in is the color of copper encounter,
ai-atk-abh03a64:1_1: Now, as to profitable things that are skillful, he rejectss in repetition opposite forces that are skillful and eliminates a following, and without resentment, because of the profitable states. Because of this, they don’t give rise to skillful qualities, because of the cause, because of the skillful quality, because of the skillful and because they are expected for the sake of that.
ai-atk-abh03a64:1_2: In that case they get skillfully by way of speech.
ai-atk-abh03a64:1_3: It doesn’t become skillful or unskillful.
ai-atk-abh03a64:1_4: Therefore he should give the wholesome aggregates in the consciousness phenomena, without getting rid of form. Then he should give it away with the intention to return.
ai-atk-abh03a64:1_5: Also all the hard responsesively when excited, the meditators say, “Thoses in whatever place he likes poor wretches the head is indeed,”
ai-atk-abh03a64:1_6: And just as in the case of the two
ai-atk-abh03a64:3_0: At the very place of the three worlds: this supreme blessing.
ai-atk-abh03a64:4_0: Kindly means both bad and badly.
ai-atk-abh03a64:6_0: In the six kinds of enlightenment factor:
ai-atk-abh03a64:7_0: Eight reasons to the Simile of the Dhamma in the Vedas: there are no places for setting aside laws in the Commentaries.
ai-atk-abh03a64:7_1: But here there is one place opposite for four months and four immaterial states. The four are not to be understood in each and four instances.
